info.name: [SH17A] Particle Interaction
info.description:
Fun challenge! Running slow in fullscreen though, don't have the chars to discard particles. Also takes a while for it to "warm up"

Edit: managed to save a few more characters so I made the 'sparkling' effect a  bit stronger. 
Edit 2: wooho, colors!

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 c, in vec2 p )
{
	c = texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(p),0);              // c.xy = pos
    c.xy += sin(iTime*.3+p.x*9.) > .999? 
        - c.xy         //clear 
        	: 
    	cos(sin(p)+p); //move it
}
